settings.title: How to keep your ice cream from melting in a buffet?
settings.text: To prevent ice cream from melting in a buffet, consider using chilled serving containers or bowls and placing the ice cream in a tray of ice. Keep the buffet area cool and shaded, and replenish the ice regularly to maintain a consistent temperature and ensure the ice cream stays firm.

settings.title: How do you serve ice cream?
settings.text: To serve ice cream, use a scoop warmed in hot water for smooth scooping. Place the scoops in pre-chilled bowls or cones, and consider adding toppings or sauces for extra flavor. Serve promptly to ensure the ice cream maintains its ideal texture.

custom_css: header {margin-top: auto; margin-bottom: auto; margin-right: 1rem; margin-left: -1rem;}
@media (min-width: 769px) {div {display: grid; grid-template-rows: auto auto; grid-template-columns: auto auto; column-gap: 2rem; } div > header {grid-column: 1 / -1; margin-bottom: 1rem; }}
div > div > div > button > :nth-child(2) {display: block; width: 14rem;}
div > div > div {display: flex; flex-direction: column;}
